Text:
Classification: Documentary
Genre: Family | Lifestyle
Status: New Series
Network: Channel 4 ( United Kingdom)
Airs: Wednesdays at 08:30 pm
Runtime: 30 Minutes
Premiere: March 30, 2011

Superscrimpers: Waste Not, Want Not is a consumer programme which sees different families trying out different fun money saving challenges. The series is presented by Mrs Moneypenny and financial journalist Merryn Somerset Webb. Mrs Moneypenny spends time with with a different family each week and takes a look at their finances and offers tips on how to manage them better.
(http://www.tvrage.com/Superscrimpers)
